generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and a crosswalk, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the curb and some pedestrians.
- building: A building with windows and a facade is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and bushes lining the road and surrounding the area.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy in the upper left part of the image.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: A person wearing a helmet is riding a motorcycle in the middle of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road on the left side of the image.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the middle of the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) and a circular "No Left Turn" sign are visible on poles near the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
